files:
- dxwnd: https://freefr.dl.sourceforge.net/project/dxwnd/Latest%20build/v2_05_14_build.rar
- mr1: N/A:Please select the GOG installer
game:
  args: /r:0
  exe: drive_c/dxwnd/dxwnd.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /SILENT
    description: Installing...
    executable: mr1
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: CSMT
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\Direct3D\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: '00000000'
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/dxwnd
    file: dxwnd
- input_menu:
    description: 'Choose the game''s language:'
    id: LANG
    options:
    - us: English
    - fr: "Fran\xE7ais"
    - it: Italian
    - sw: Sweden
    - sp: Spanish
    - gr: Deutch
    preselect: us
- write_config:
    data:
      target:
        coord0: 3
        dflag0: 0
        filterid0: 0
        flag0: 673185825
        flagg0: 134221968
        flagh0: 534
        flagi0: 136347652
        flagj0: 4096
        flagk0: 65536
        flagl0: 0
        flagm0: 0
        flagn0: 17825796
        flago0: 0
        icon0: 
        initresh0: 600
        initresw0: 800
        initts0: 0
        launchpath0: C:\GOG Games\Moto Racer\game.EXE -$INPUT_LANG
        maxddinterface0: 7
        maxfps0: 8
        maxres0: -1
        monitorid0: -1
        path0: C:\GOG Games\Moto Racer\game.EXE
        posx0: 50
        posy0: 50
        renderer0: 0
        scanline0: 0
        sizx0: 800
        sizy0: 600
        slowratio0: 0
        swapeffect0: 0
        tflag0: 0
        title0: Moto Racer 1
        ver0: 0
        winver0: 1
      window:
        exepath: C:\GOG Games\Moto Racer\
        expert: 1
        exportpath: C:\dxwnd\exports\
        posx: 1422
        posy: 417
        sizx: 320
        sizy: 200
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/dxwnd/dxwnd.ini
wine:
  Desktop: true
  overrides:
    winmm: n,b
